name: SAN FRANCISCO GENERAL HOSPITAL FOUNDATION
description: A foundation dedicated to supporting the Zuckerberg San Francisco General Hospital.
sampleDescriptions: Fiscal Year 2023 healthcare appropriations and general federal healthcare policy issues.
Fiscal Year 2023 healthcare appropriations and general federal healthcare policy issues.
Engagement on FY23 LHHS Appropriations (H.R. 8295) Congressional Directed Spending requests to support mental and behavioral health.
Issues related to funding for hospital-based mental health services; Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2023 (H.R. 8295).
Issues related to funding for hospital-based mental health services; the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2023 (P.L. 117-328).
